   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1,
   67:          run_prefs_cases/1]).
   68: 
   69: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   70: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   72: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   73: 
   74: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   75:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   76:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   77:     )).
   78: 
   79: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   80:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   81:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   82:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   83:     )).
   84: 
   85: -record(rsm_in, {
   86:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   87:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   88:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   89:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   90:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   91:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   92:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   93:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   94:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   95:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   96:         }).
   97: 
   98: -record(forwarded_message, {
   99:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  100:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  101:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  102:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  103:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  104:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  105:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  106:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  107:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  108: }).
  109: 
  110: -record(result_iq, {
  111:     from            :: binary(),
  112:     to              :: binary(),
  113:     id              :: binary(),
  114:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  116:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  118: }).
  119: 
  120: -record(error_iq, {
  121:     id              :: binary(),
  122:     type            :: binary(),
  123:     error_type      :: binary(),
  124:     condition       :: binary(),
  125:     text            :: binary()
  126: }).
  127: 
  128: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  129:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  130:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  131:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  132: }).
  133: 
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: %% Suite configuration
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: 
  138: muc_host() ->
  139:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  140: 
  141: host() ->
  142:     <<"localhost">>.
  143: 
  144: configurations() ->
  145:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  146:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  147: 
  148: odbc_configs(true) ->
  149:     [odbc,
  150:      odbc_async_pool,
  151:      odbc_mnesia,
  152:      odbc_dirty_mnesia,
  153:      odbc_async_cache,
  154:      odbc_cache,
  155:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  156:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  157: odbc_configs(_) ->
  158:     [].
  159: 
  160: riak_configs(true) ->
  161:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  162: riak_configs(_) ->
  163:      [].
  164: 
  165: basic_group_names() ->
  166:     [
  167:     mam,
  168:     mam_purge,
  169:     muc,
  170:     muc_with_pm,
  171:     rsm,
  172:     with_rsm,
  173:     muc_rsm,
  174:     bootstrapped,
  175:     archived,
  176:     policy_violation,
  177:     offline_message,
  178:     prefs_cases
  179:     ].
  180: 
  181: all() ->
  182:     Reasons =
  183:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  184:         false -> [require_odbc];
  185:         true  -> []
  186:     end,
  187:     case Reasons of
  188:         [] ->
  189:             tests();
  190:         [_|_] ->
  191:             {skip, Reasons}
  192:     end.
  193: 
  194: tests() ->
  195:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  196:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  197:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  198: 
  199: groups() ->
  200:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  201:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  202:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  203: 
  204: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  205:     false.
  206: 
  207: 
  208: basic_groups() ->
  209:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  210:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  211:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  212:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  213:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  214:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  215:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  216:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  217:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  218:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  219:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  220:      {prefs_cases,      [], [run_prefs_cases]}].
  221: 
  222: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  223:      [purge_old_single_message,
  224:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  225: 
  226: mam_cases() ->
  227:     [mam_service_discovery,
  228:      simple_archive_request,
  229:      range_archive_request,
  230:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  231:      limit_archive_request,
  232:      prefs_set_request,
  233:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  234:      iq_spoofing].
  235: 
  236: mam_purge_cases() ->
  237:     [purge_single_message,
  238:      purge_multiple_messages].
  239: 
  240: archived_cases() ->
  241:     [archived,
  242:      strip_archived,
  243:      filter_forwarded].
  244: 
  245: policy_violation_cases() ->
  246:     [policy_violation].
  247: 
  248: offline_message_cases() ->
  249:     [offline_message].
  250: 
  251: muc_cases() ->
  252:     [muc_service_discovery,
  253:      muc_archive_request,
  254:      muc_archive_purge,
  255:      muc_multiple_devices,
  256:      muc_private_message,
  257:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  258:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  259:      ].
  260: 
  261: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  262:     rsm_cases().
  263: 
  264: with_rsm_cases() ->
  265:     rsm_cases().
  266: 
  267: rsm_cases() ->
  268:       [pagination_first5,
  269:        pagination_last5,
  270:        pagination_before10,
  271:        pagination_after10,
  272:        pagination_empty_rset,
  273:        %% Border cases
  274:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  275:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  276:        %% Simple cases
  277:        pagination_simple_before10,
  278:        %% opt_count cases
  279:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  280:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  281:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  282:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  283:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  284:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  285:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  286: 
  287: suite() ->
  288:     escalus:suite().
  289: 
  290: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  291:     delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  292:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)]).
  293: 
  294: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  295:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  296: 
  297: user_names() ->
  298:     [alice, bob, kate].
  299: 
  300: create_users(Config) ->
  301:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  302: 
  303: delete_users(Config) ->
  304:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  305:     Config.
  306: 
  307: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  308:    C = configuration(Group),
  309:    B = basic_group(Group),
  310:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  311:         skip ->
  312:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  313:         Config0 ->
  314:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  315:                    [Group, C, B]),
  316:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  317:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  318:     end.
  319: 
  320: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  321:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  322:     case C of
  323:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  324:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  325:         _ ->
  326:             Config0
  327:     end.
  328: 
  329: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  330:     delete_users(Config),
  331:     C = configuration(Group),
  332:     B = basic_group(Group),
  333:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  334: 
  335: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  336:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  337: 
  338: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  339:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  340:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  341:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  342:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  343:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  344:     Config;
  345: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  346:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  347:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  348:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  349:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  350:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  351:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  352:     Config;
  353: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  354:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  355:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  356:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  357:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  358:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  359:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  360:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  361:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  362:     Config;
  363: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  364:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  365:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  366:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  367:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  368:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  369:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  370:     Config;
  371: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  372:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  373:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  374:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  377:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  378:     Config;
  379: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  380:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  381:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  382:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  383:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  387:     Config;
  388: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  389:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  390:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  391:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  392:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  393:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  398:     Config;
  399: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  400:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  401:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  402:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  403:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  405:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  406:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  407:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  408:     Config;
  409: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  412:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  413:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  414:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  415:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  417:     Config;
  418: 
  419: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  420:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  421:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  423:     Config;
  424: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  425:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  427:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  430:     Config;
  431: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  437:     Config;
  438: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  443:     Config;
  444: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  449:     Config;
  450: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  456:     Config;
  457: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  464:     Config;
  465: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  471:     Config;
  472: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  478:     Config;
  479: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  484:     Config;
  485: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  486:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  490:     Config;
  491: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  497:     Config;
  498: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  499:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  500:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  502:     Config;
  503: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  506:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  509:     Config;
  510: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  515:     Config;
  516: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  517:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  518:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [pm]),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  521:     Config;
  522: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  524:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  525:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  528:     Config;
  529: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  530:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  531:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  532:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  536:     Config;
  537: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  538:     skip;
  539: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  545:     Config.
  546: 
  547: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  548:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  549:     Config.
  550: 
  551: mam_modules() ->
  552:     [mod_mam,
  553:      mod_mam_muc,
  554:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  555:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  556:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  557:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  558:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  559:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  560:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  561:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  562:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  563:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  564:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  565:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  566:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  567:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  568:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  569: 
  570: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  571:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  572:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  573:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  574:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  575: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  576:     Config;
  577: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  578:     Config;
  579: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  580:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  581: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  582:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  583:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  584: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  585:     clean_archives(Config);
  586: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  587:     clean_archives(Config).
  588: 
  589: 
  590: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  591:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  592:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  593:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  594:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  595:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  596:                                        ],
  597:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  598:                  _ ->
  599:                      ConfigIn
  600:              end,
  601:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  602: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  603:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  604: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  605:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  606: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  607:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  608: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  609:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  610: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  611:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  612:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  613: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  614:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  615:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  616: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  617:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  618:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  619: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  620:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  621:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  622: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  623:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  624:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  625: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  626:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  627: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  628:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  629: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  630:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  631: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  632:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  633: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  634:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  635:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  636: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  637:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  638: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  639:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  640: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  641:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  642: 
  643: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  644:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  645:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  646:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  647:         _ ->
  648:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  649:     end.
  650: 
  651: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  652:     destroy_room(Config),
  653:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  654: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  655:     destroy_room(Config),
  656:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  657: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  658:     destroy_room(Config),
  659:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  660: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  661:     destroy_room(Config),
  662:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  663: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  664:     destroy_room(Config),
  665:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  666: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  667:     destroy_room(Config),
  668:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  669: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  670:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  671: 
  672: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  673:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  674:     orelse
  675:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  676:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  677:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  678: 
  679: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  680:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  681: 
  682: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  683:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  684: 
  685: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  686:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  687:         non_existing -> ok;
  688:         false        -> ok;
  689:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  690:     end.
  691: 
  692: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  693:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  694:     ok.
  695: 
  696: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  697:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  698:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  699:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  700:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  701:     Result ->
  702:         Result
  703:     end.
  704: 
  705: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  706:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  707:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  708:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  709: 
  710: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  711: %% Group name helpers
  712: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  713: 
  714: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  715:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  716: 
  717: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  718: configuration(Group) ->
  719:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  720: 
  721: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  722: %% will be tested.
  723: %%
  724: %% Example:
  725: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  726: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  727: %% @end
  728: make_greedy(List) ->
  729:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  730: 
  731: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  732: basic_group(Group) ->
  733:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  734: 
  735: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  736:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  737:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  738:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  739: 
  740: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  741:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  742: 
  743: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  744:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  745:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  746:         true -> PrefixA;
  747:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  748:     end.
  749: 
  750: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  751:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  752: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  753:     Target.
  754: 
  755: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  756:     Tail.
  757: 
  758: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  759: %% Adhoc tests
  760: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  761: 
  762: %% Querying the archive for messages
  763: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  764:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  765:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  766:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  767:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  768:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  769:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  770:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  771:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  772:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  773:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  774:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  775:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  776:         ok
  777:         end,
  778:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  779:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  780:                       ],
  781:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  782:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  783: 
  784: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  785:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  786:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  787:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  788: 
  789:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  790: 
  791:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  792:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  793:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  794:         ok
  795:         end,
  796:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  797: 
  798: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  799:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  800:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  801:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  802: 
  803:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  804: 
  805:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  806:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  807:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  808: 
  809:         ok
  810:         end,
  811:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  812: 
  813: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  814:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  815:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  816:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  817: 
  818:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  819:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  820:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  821: 
  822:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  823:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  824:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  825: 
  826:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  827:         ok
  828:         end,
  829:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  830: 
  831: archived(Config) ->
  832:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  833:         %% Archive must be empty.
  834:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  835:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  836: 
  837:         %% Bob receives a message.
  838:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  839:         try
  840:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  841:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  842:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  843:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  844:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  845: 
  846:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  847: 
  848:         %% Bob calls archive.
  849:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  850:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  851:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  852:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  853:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  854:         ok
  855:         catch Class:Reason ->
  856:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  857:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  858:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  859:         end
  860:         end,
  861:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  862: 
  863: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  864:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  865:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  866:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  867: 
  868:         %% Bob receives a message.
  869:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  870:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  871:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  872:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  873: 
  874:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  875:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  876:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  877:         ok
  878:         end,
  879:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  880: 
  881: strip_archived(Config) ->
  882:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  883:         %% Archive must be empty.
  884:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  885:         escalus:send(Alice,
  886:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  887:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  888:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  889: 
  890:         %% Bob receives a message.
  891:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  892:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  893:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  894:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  895:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  896:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  897: 
  898:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  899: 
  900:         try
  901:         %% Bob calls archive.
  902:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  903:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  904:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  905:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  906:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  907:         ok
  908:         catch Class:Reason ->
  909:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  910:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  911:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  912:         end
  913:         end,
  914:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  915: 
  916: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  917:     %% rot1
  918:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  919:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  920: 
  921: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  922:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  923:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  924:         true ->
  925:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  926:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  927:         false -> ok
  928:     end,
  929:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  930:         true  -> [S];
  931:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  932:     end.
  933: 
  934: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  935:     Respond;
  936: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  937:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  938:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  939:     %% void()
  940: 
  941: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  942: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  943: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  944: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  945: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  946: policy_violation(Config) ->
  947:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  948:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  949:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  950:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  951:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  952:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  953:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  954:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  955:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  956:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  957:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  958:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  959:         try
  960:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
  961:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
  962:             ok
  963:         catch Class:Reason ->
  964:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  965:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
  966:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  967:         end
  968:         end,
  969:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  970: 
  971: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
  972: offline_message(Config) ->
  973:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
  974:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  975:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
  976:         escalus:send(Alice,
  977:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
  978:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  979:         ok
  980:         end,
  981:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
  982: 
  983:     %% Bob logs in
  984:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  985: 
  986:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
  987:     %% will be delivered automatically.
  988: 
  989:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
  990:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
  991: 
  992:     %% Bob checks his archive.
  993:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  994:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
  995:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
  996: 
  997:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  998: 
  999: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1000:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1001:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1002:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1003:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1004:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1005:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1006:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1007:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1008:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1009:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1010:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1011:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1012:             ok
 1013:         end,
 1014:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1015: 
 1016: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1017:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1018:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1019:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1020:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1021:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
 1022:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1023:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1024:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1025:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1026:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1027:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1028:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1029:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1030:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1031:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1032:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1033:             ok
 1034:         end,
 1035:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1036: 
 1037: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1038:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1039:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1040:             [begin
 1041:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1042:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1043:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1044:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1045:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1046:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1047:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1048:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1049:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1050:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1051:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1052:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1053:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1054:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1055:             ok
 1056:         end,
 1057:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1058: 
 1059: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1060:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1061:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1062:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1063:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1064:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1065:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1066: 
 1067:         %% Bob received presences.
 1068:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1069: 
 1070:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1071:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1072: 
 1073:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1074: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1075: 
 1076:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1077:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1078:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1079:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1080:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1081:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1082:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1083:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1084:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1085:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1086: 
 1087:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1088: 
 1089:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1090:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1091:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1092:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1093:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1094:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1095:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1096:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1097:         ok
 1098:         end,
 1099:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1100: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1101: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1102:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1103:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1104:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1105:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1106:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1107:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1108: 
 1109:         %% Bob received presences.
 1110:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1111: 
 1112:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1113:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1114: 
 1115:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1116:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1117: 
 1118:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1119:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1120:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1121:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1122:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1123:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1124:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1125:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1126:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1127:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1128:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1129:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1130:         ok
 1131:     end,
 1132:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1133: 
 1134: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1135:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1136:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1137:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1138:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1139:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1140:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1141:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1142:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1143: 
 1144:         %% Alice received presences.
 1145:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1146:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1147: 
 1148:         %% Bob received presences.
 1149:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1150: 
 1151:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1152:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1153: 
 1154:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1155:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1156:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1157: 
 1158:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1159: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1160: 
 1161:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1162:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1163:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1164: 
 1165:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1166:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1167: 
 1168:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1169:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1170:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1171: 
 1172:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1173:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1174:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1175:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1176:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1177:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1178:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1179:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1180:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1181:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1182: 
 1183:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1184: 
 1185:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1186: 
 1187:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1188: 
 1189:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1190:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1191:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1192:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1193:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1194:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1195:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1196:         ok
 1197:         end,
 1198:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1199: 
 1200: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1201:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1202:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1203:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1204:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1205:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1206: 
 1207:         %% Bob received presences.
 1208:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1209: 
 1210:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1211:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1212: 
 1213:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1214:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1215:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1216:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1217: 
 1218:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1219:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1220:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1221: 
 1222:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1223:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1224:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1225:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1226:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1227:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1228: 
 1229:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1230:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1231:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1232:         ok
 1233:         end,
 1234:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1235: 
 1236: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1237: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1238:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1239:         %% Send
 1240:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1241:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1242:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1243:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1244:         %%   </query>
 1245:         %% </iq>
 1246:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1247:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1248:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1249:         ok
 1250:         end,
 1251:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1252: 
 1253: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1254:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1255:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1256:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1257:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1258:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1259:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1260:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1261:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1262:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1263:         %% Send
 1264:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1265:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1266:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1267:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1268:         %%   </query>
 1269:         %% </iq>
 1270:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1271:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1272:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1273:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1274:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1275:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1276:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1277:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1278:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1279:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1280:         ok
 1281:         end,
 1282:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1283: 
 1284: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1285:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1286:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1287:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1288:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1289: 
 1290: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1291: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1292: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1293:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1294:         %% Send
 1295:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1296:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1297:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1298:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1299:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1300:         %%       </set>
 1301:         %%   </query>
 1302:         %% </iq>
 1303:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1304:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1305:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1306:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1307:         ok
 1308:         end,
 1309:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1310: 
 1311: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1312:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1313:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1314:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1315: 
 1316:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1317:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1318:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1319:         end,
 1320:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1321: 
 1322: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1323:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1324:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1325:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1326:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1327:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1328:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1329:         ok
 1330:         end,
 1331:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1332: 
 1333: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1334:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1335:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1336:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1337:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1338:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1339:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1340:         ok
 1341:         end,
 1342:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1343: 
 1344: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1345:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1346:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1347:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1348:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1349:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1350:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1351:         ok
 1352:         end,
 1353:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1354: 
 1355: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1356:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1357:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1358:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1359:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1360:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1361:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1362:         ok
 1363:         end,
 1364:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1365: 
 1366: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1367:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1368:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1369:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1370:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1371:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1372:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1373:         ok
 1374:         end,
 1375:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1376: 
 1377: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1378:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1379:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1380:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1381:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1382:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1383:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1384:         ok
 1385:         end,
 1386:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1387: 
 1388: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1389:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1390:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1391:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1392:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1393:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1394:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1395:         ok
 1396:         end,
 1397:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1398: 
 1399: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1400:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1401:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1402:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1403:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1404:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1405:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1406:         ok
 1407:         end,
 1408:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1409: 
 1410: 
 1411: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1412:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1413:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1414:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1415:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1416:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1417:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1418:         ok
 1419:         end,
 1420:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1421: 
 1422: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1423:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1424:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1425:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1426:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1427:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1428:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1429:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1430:         ok
 1431:         end,
 1432:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1433: 
 1434: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1435:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1436:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1437:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1438:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1439:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1440:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1441:         ok
 1442:         end,
 1443:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1444: 
 1445: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1446: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1447: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1448:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1449:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1450:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1451:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1452:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1453:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1454:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1455:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1456:         ok
 1457:         end,
 1458:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1459: 
 1460: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1461: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1462:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1463:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1464:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1465:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1466:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1467:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1468:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1469:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1470:         ok
 1471:         end,
 1472:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1473: 
 1474: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1475:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1476: 
 1477: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1478:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1479:         true ->
 1480:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1481:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1482:         _ ->
 1483:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1484:     end.
 1485: 
 1486: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1487:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1488:         true ->
 1489:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1490:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1491:         _ ->
 1492:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1493:     end.
 1494: 
 1495: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1496:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1497:         %% Send
 1498:         %%
 1499:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1500:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1501:         %%     <always>
 1502:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1503:         %%     </always>
 1504:         %%     <never>
 1505:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1506:         %%     </never>
 1507:         %%   </prefs>
 1508:         %% </iq>
 1509:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1510:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1511:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1512:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1513: 
 1514:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1515:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1516: 
 1517:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1518:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1519:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1520:         ok
 1521:         end,
 1522:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1523: 
 1524: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1525: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1526: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1527: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1528: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1529:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1530:         %% Send
 1531:         %%
 1532:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1533:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1534:         %%     <always>
 1535:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1536:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1537:         %%     </always>
 1538:         %%   </prefs>
 1539:         %% </iq>
 1540:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1541:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1542:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1543:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1544:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1545: 
 1546:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1547:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1548: 
 1549:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1550:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1551:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1552:         ok
 1553:         end,
 1554:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1555: 
 1556: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1557:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1558:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1559:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1560:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1561:         try
 1562:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1563:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1564:         ok
 1565:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1566:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1567:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1568:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1569:         end
 1570:         end,
 1571:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1572: 
 1573: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1574: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1575:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1576:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1577:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1578:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1579:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1580:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1581:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1582:         ok
 1583:         end,
 1584:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1585: 
 1586: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1587:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1588:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1589:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1590:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1591:         %% when it is not specified.
 1592:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1593:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1594:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1595:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1596:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1597:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1598:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1599:         ok
 1600:         end,
 1601:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1602: 
 1603: result_iq() ->
 1604:     #xmlel{
 1605:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1606:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1607:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1608: 
 1609: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1610: %% Helpers
 1611: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1612: 
 1613: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1614: 
 1615: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1616: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1617: 
 1618: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1619:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1620:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1621:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1622:     }]).
 1623: 
 1624: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1625:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1626:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1627:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1628:        children = skip_undefined([
 1629:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1630:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1631:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1632:     }]).
 1633: 
 1634: 
 1635: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1636:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1637: 
 1638: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1639:     [];
 1640: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1641:     [{K, V}].
 1642: 
 1643: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1644:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1645: 
 1646: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1647:     undefined;
 1648: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1649:     #xmlel{
 1650:         name = <<"start">>,
 1651:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1652: 
 1653: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1654:     undefined;
 1655: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1656:     #xmlel{
 1657:         name = <<"end">>,
 1658:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1659: 
 1660: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1661:     undefined;
 1662: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1663:     #xmlel{
 1664:         name = <<"with">>,
 1665:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1666: 
 1667: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1668: %% a certain query.
 1669: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1670:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1671:                               undefined, undefined,
 1672:                               undefined, undefined).
 1673: 
 1674: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1675:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1676:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1677:                               undefined, undefined).
 1678: 
 1679: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1680:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1681:                               Start, Stop,
 1682:                               undefined, undefined).
 1683: 
 1684: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1685:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1686:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1687: 
 1688: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1689:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1690: 
 1691: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1692:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1693:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1694: 
 1695: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1696:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1697:        name = <<"query">>,
 1698:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1699:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1700:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1701:        children = skip_undefined([
 1702:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1703:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1704:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1705:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1706:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1707:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1708:     }]).
 1709: 
 1710: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1711:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1712: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1713:     [].
 1714: 
 1715: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1716:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1717: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1718:     [].
 1719: 
 1720: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1721:     [];
 1722: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1723:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1724:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1725:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1726:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1727:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1728: 
 1729: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1730:     undefined;
 1731: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1732:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1733:            children = skip_undefined([
 1734:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1735:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1736:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1737: 
 1738: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1739: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1740: 
 1741: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1742:     undefined;
 1743: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1744:     #xmlel{
 1745:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1746:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1747: 
 1748: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1749:     undefined;
 1750: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1751:     #xmlel{
 1752:         name = <<"index">>,
 1753:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1754: 
 1755: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1756:     undefined;
 1757: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1758:     #xmlel{
 1759:         name = <<"max">>,
 1760:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1761: 
 1762: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1763:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1764:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1765:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1766:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1767: 
 1768: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1769:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1770:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1771:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1772: 
 1773: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1774:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1775:     A =:= Raw.
 1776: 
 1777: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1778: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1779: 
 1780: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 1781:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1782:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1783:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1784:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 1785:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1786:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1787:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1788:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1789:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 1790:     }]).
 1791: 
 1792: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1793:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1794:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1795:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1796:     }]).
 1797: 
 1798: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1799: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1800:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1801: 
 1802: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1803:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1804: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1805:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1806:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1807: 
 1808: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1809: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1810: 
 1811: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1812:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1813:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1814:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1815:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1816:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1817: 
 1818: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1819:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1820:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1821:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1822:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1823:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1824:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1825: 
 1826: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 1827:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1828:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1829: 
 1830: 
 1831: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1832:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1833:     M#forwarded_message{
 1834:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1835:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1836: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1837:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1838:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1839:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1840:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1841:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1842:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1843:                 M1, Children).
 1844: 
 1845: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1846:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1847:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1848: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1849: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1850:     M.
 1851: 
 1852: %% Num is 1-based.
 1853: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1854:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1855:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1856:     Id.
 1857: 
 1858: 
 1859: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1860: %%
 1861: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1862: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1863: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1864: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1865: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1866: %%     []}]
 1867: %%
