 1868: %%
 1869: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1870: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1871: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1872: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1873: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1874: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1875: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1876: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1877: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1878: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1879: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1880: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1881: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1882: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1883: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1884:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1885:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1886:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1887:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1888:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1889:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1890: 
 1891: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1892:                      IQ) ->
 1893:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1894: 
 1895: 
 1896: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1897:                                   children = Children},
 1898:                            IQ) ->
 1899:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1900: 
 1901: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1902:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1903:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1904:                                IQ) ->
 1905:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1906:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1907:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1908:             end,
 1909:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1910: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1911:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1912:                                IQ) ->
 1913:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1914: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1915:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1916:                                IQ) ->
 1917:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1918: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1919: 
 1920: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1921: 
 1922: 
 1923: 
 1924: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1925:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1926:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1927: 
 1928: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1929:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1930:                            IQ) ->
 1931:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1932:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1933:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1934: 
 1935: 
 1936: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1937:                                         children = Children},
 1938:                                  IQ) ->
 1939:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1940: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1941:                                         children = Children},
 1942:                                  IQ) ->
 1943:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1944: 
 1945: 
 1946: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1947:     [JID || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1948: 
 1949: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1950: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1951: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1952: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1953: %%   </error>
 1954: %% </iq>
 1955: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1956:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1957: 
 1958:     IQ = #error_iq{
 1959:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 1960:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1961:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1962: 
 1963: 
 1964: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 1965:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 1966:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 1967:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1968:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 1969: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 1970:     IQ.
 1971: 
 1972: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 1973:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 1974:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 1975: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 1976:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 1977: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 1978:     IQ.
 1979: 
 1980: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1981: %% Helpers (muc)
 1982: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1983: 
 1984: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 1985:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1986:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1987:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 1988:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 1989:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 1990: 
 1991: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 1992:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 1993:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 1994:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 1995:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 1996:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 1997: 
 1998: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 1999:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2000:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2001:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2002:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2003: 
 2004: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2005:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2006:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2007:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2008:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2009:         _ -> ok
 2010:     end.
 2011: 
 2012: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2013:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2014:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2015:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2016:                    Room, Nick).
 2017: 
 2018: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2019:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2020: 
 2021: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2022:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2023: 
 2024: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2025:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2026: 
 2027: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2028:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2029: 
 2030: 
 2031: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2032:     Pid = self(),
 2033:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2034:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2035:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2036:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2037:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2038: 
 2039:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2040:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2041: 
 2042:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2043:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2044:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2045:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2046:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2047:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2048:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2049:         %% Get whole history.
 2050:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2051:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2052:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2053:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2054:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2055:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2056:         ok
 2057:         end,
 2058:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2059:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2060:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2061:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2062: 
 2063:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2064:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2065: 
 2066: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2067:     Pid = self(),
 2068:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2069:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2070:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2071:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2072:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2073:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2074:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2075:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2076:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2077:         %% Get whole history.
 2078:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2079:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2080:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2081:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2082:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2083:         ok
 2084:         end,
 2085:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2086:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2087:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2088:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2089: 
 2090:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2091:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2092: 
 2093: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2094:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2095: 
 2096: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2097:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2098:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2099: 
 2100: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2101:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2102:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2103:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2104:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2105:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2106:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2107:     Config.
 2108: 
 2109: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2110:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2111:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2112:     timer:sleep(500),
 2113:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2114:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2115:     Config.
 2116: 
 2117: serv_users(Config) ->
 2118:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2119:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2120: 
 2121: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2122:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2123:     {Server, Username}.
 2124: 
 2125: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2126: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2127:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2128:        0 -> ok;
 2129:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2130:     end.
 2131: 
 2132: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2133: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2134:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2135:        0 -> ok;
 2136:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2137:     end.
 2138: 
 2139: 
 2140: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2141:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2142: 
 2143: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2144:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2145: 
 2146: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2147:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2148: 
 2149: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2150:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2151: 
 2152: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2153:     %% Do not care
 2154:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2155:     ok.
 2156: 
 2157: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2158:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2159: 
 2160: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2161:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2162:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2163:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2164:     try
 2165:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2166:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2167:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2168:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2169:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2170:         ok
 2171:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2172:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2173:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2174:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2175:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2176:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2177:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2178:     end.
 2179: 
 2180: 
 2181: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2182:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2183:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2184:     try
 2185:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2186:         ok
 2187:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2188:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2189:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2190:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2191:     end.
 2192: 
 2193: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2194:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2195:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2196:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2197:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2198:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2199:     end.
 2200: 
 2201: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2202:     random:seed(now()),
 2203:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2204:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2205:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2206:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2207:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2208:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2209:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2210:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2211:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2212:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2213:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2214: 
 2215: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2216:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2217:         ID1 =< ID2
 2218:     end,
 2219:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2220: 
 2221: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2222:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2223:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2224:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2225:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2226:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2227: 
 2228: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2229:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2230: 
 2231:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2232:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2233: 
 2234: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2235:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2236:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2237:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2238:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2239:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2240:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2241:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2242: 
 2243: random_time() ->
 2244:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2245:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2246:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2247: 
 2248: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2249:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2250:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2251:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2252:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2253: 
 2254: 
 2255: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2256:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2257: 
 2258: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2259:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2260:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2261:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2262:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2263:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2264:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2265: 
 2266: archive_message(Args) ->
 2267:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2268: 
 2269: 
 2270: 
 2271: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2272:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2273: 
 2274:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2275:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2276:     R = room_address(Room),
 2277: 
 2278:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2279:     Host = host(),
 2280:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2281:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2282:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2283:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2284:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2285:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2286:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2287:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2288: 
 2289:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2290: 
 2291:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2292: 
 2293:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2294: 
 2295: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2296:     Host = host(),
 2297:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2298: 
 2299: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2300:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2301:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2302:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2303:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2304: 
 2305: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2306: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2307:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2308:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2309: 
 2310: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2311:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2312: 
 2313: 
 2314: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2315:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2316: 
 2317: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2318:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2319:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2320:         Other ->
 2321:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2322:             false
 2323:     end.
 2324: 
 2325: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2326:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2327:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2328:             true;
 2329:         _ ->
 2330:             false
 2331:     end.
 2332: 
 2333: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2334:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2335: 
 2336: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2337:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2338:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2339:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2340:     Client.
 2341: 
 2342: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2343:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2344:         undefined ->
 2345:             ok;
 2346:         Value ->
 2347:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2348:     end.
 2349: 
 2350: 
 2351: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2352: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2353: %%
 2354: %% Messages:
 2355: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2356: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2357: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2358: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2359: %%
 2360: %% Each tuple is
 2361: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2362: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2363: prefs_cases() ->
 2364:     [
 2365:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2366:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2367:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2368:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2369:  
 2370:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2371:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2372:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2373:  
 2374:  
 2375:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2376:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2377:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2378:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2379:  
 2380:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2381:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2382:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2383:  
 2384:  
 2385:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2386:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2387:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2388:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2389:  
 2390:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2391:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2392:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2393:     ].
 2394: 
 2395: 
 2396: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2397:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2398:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2399:         [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2400:         end,
 2401:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2402: 
 2403: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2404:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2405:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2406:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2407: 
 2408:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2409:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2410:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2411: 
 2412:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2413:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2414:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2415: 
 2416:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2417:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2418:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2419:         ok.
 2420: 
 2421: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2422:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2423:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2424:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2425:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2426:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2427:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2428:     %% Messages:
 2429:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2430:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2431:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2432:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2433:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2434:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2435:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2436:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2437:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2438:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2439:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2440:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2441:     %% Get last four archived texts
 2442:     Stanzas = get_last_four_messages(Alice),
 2443:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2444:     Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2445:     ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2446:     ?assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2447:                         [{prefs_state, PrefsState}]),
 2448:     ok.
 2449: 
 2450: get_last_four_messages(Alice) ->
 2451:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2452:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2453:     [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2454:     AllMessages.
 2455: 
 2456: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2457:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2458:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2459:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2460:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2461: 
 2462: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2463:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2464: 
 2465: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2466:     I = iolib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2467:                       "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2468:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
